section.name: Commercial Support
section.p:
Ready-made commercial SignServer support
Support programs and other qualified professional services are provided by PrimeKey Solutions AB.

section.name: Contributors
section.p: The best way to contact the project admins are using email.

ul.li: Send an email to the signserver-develop mailing list.
Send an email directly to a project administrator.
Send an email directly to ejbca-support at primekey dot se.

section.name: Documentation
section.p: First of all, have a look at the SignServer documentation resources gathered below "Documentation" in the main menu.

section.name: Training
section.p:
Established SignServer Training
Training Courses for advanced users can be requested from PrimeKey and their partners.

section.name: Mailing Lists
section.p: The SignServer project has two public mailing lists hosted on Sourceforge. To subscribe to any of the lists or browse archived messages, click the links below.
signserver-announce A low traffic list about new releases and patches.
signserver-develop is used for discussions of a more technical nature. Almost anything regarding SignServer can be posted on this list.

section.name: Discussion Forums
section.p: There are also several public discussion forums that are used for discussions and requests for help etc.

section.name: IRC
section.p: For direct chat for help and to meet the project administrators join the chat.
Connect you IRC-chat program to #signserver channel at irc.freenode.net.
